body_html:
Does not work for me.
What helped:

vim torch/lib/TH/cmake/FindMKL.cmake

  1. corrected line 42 to become: SET(mklvers "intel64")
  2. added following after line 66: SET(INTEL_COMPILER_DIR "/opt/intel")

from
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/python-setup-py-build-does-not-find-installed-mkl/4618/2
